extendedInfo.description: Simple and intuitive calculator for - Body Mass Index (BMI), - Body Surface Area (BSA), - Lean Body Weight and - Ideal Body WeightSupports entering weight in both inches and cm

reviews.title: Not accurate
reviews.comment: I was typing really low numbers in, and it still read obese.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best bmi app
reviews.comment: Comments units support vis versa
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Much better icon, thanks for listening to users!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: G1: (Keeps the #\'s: but reverting to kg cm) landscape only? Ads coverup bottom so cant read uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: \"Update\" did not fix unit changing. \"Update\" only makes the app show up as having more downloads. Also, the new icon is dreadful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well mostly, but sometimes minor bugs occur. Reverts to metric when I indicated lbs/inches.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Should really take into consideration a person\'s body type. I weigh more than some friends, yet wear a smaller size. Muscle weighs more!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like this app ....but you cant read the BMI Status because of the add on bottom .They have to fix that problm ! Other than that it a good app .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ad gets in the way. Says i need to lose 24 lbs w/out knowing composition. Im a trainer i dont have that much fat total. Failed attempt @ failed idea
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sooo ridiculous its saying i need to be 100lbs at 5\"3!! Soo inaccurate!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lol! Im 5\'2\" and 95 lbs...and this says I\'m in the obese category for bmi...uninstall!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So I\'m 6\' 6\", weigh 174. According to this app this is severly obese, and to be considered lean I gotta loose 96 lbs. Wow....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really like that this app gives estimate of lean muscle mass and ideal weight. However,SI units said I was obese when the US units said I was healthy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ads covered up bottom, i loved this app until that now im peeved!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Has ad for snickers on screen just below telling you whether you are obese.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app..didn\'t need it though to tell me I\'m over weight...would b great if it let me store weight data
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 5 stars if you can feet and inches input like your bmr app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It sucked from the moment I installed it. Didn\'t work correctly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The app is awsome; but using BMI is actually a bad way to get a true assesment of total body fat index. Behold2 donut
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well as advrrtised. Desire
reviews.author: A Google User
